thread.title: Incredible Supercut Shows Every Best Animated Feature Winner Ever
thread.title_full: Incredible Supercut Shows Every Best Animated Feature Winner Ever

author: Ed Mazza
title: Incredible Supercut Shows Every Best Animated Feature Winner Ever
text:
Incredible Supercut Shows Every Best Animated Feature Winner Ever Classics. All of them. 02/15/2017 05:12 am ET Ed Mazza Overnight Editor, The Huffington Post 
There’s a long and rich history of animated feature films, but they’ve only had their own Academy Award category since “Shrek” won the prize over “Monsters Inc.” and “Jimmy Neutron: Boy Genius.” That Oscar was handed out in 2002, for movies made in 2001. 
Now, a new supercut from the YouTubers at Burger Fiction features a key scene from every single winner over the years as well as clips from all of this year’s nominees . 
Check it out above... and take a trip down memory lane.
